description: The galaxy NGC 7318b has collided with its neighbours in Stephan’s Quintet, creating one of the most powerful shockwaves observed in space. The resulting debris, glowing plasma, and star formation are being studied using advanced spectrographic tools, offering rare insights into galaxy formation and evolution.
title: Distant Galaxies Crash to Produce Massive Sonic Boom, Could Reveal Secrets About the Universe: Report

description: SpaceX is preparing to launch 23 Starlink satellites, including 12 with direct-to-smartphone technology, from Florida's Space Coast on November 25. A Falcon 9 rocket will carry the payload, and its booster will attempt its 13th landing post-liftoff on a droneship. Deployment into low Earth orbit is scheduled about 65 minutes after liftoff. The Starlink constellation, now with over 6,600 active satellites, aims to provide enhanced global internet access, particularly in remote regions.
title: SpaceX Launching 23 More Starlink Satellites Aboard Falcon 9 Rocket from Florida

description: Chinese scientists have developed an advanced microwave weapon capable of merging multiple high-frequency beams into one, targeting a single location. This new technology, claimed to have an effect greater than the sum of its parts, has been compared to the Death Star’s beam convergence. However, experts highlight challenges with precision, alignment, and energy capacity, especially in real-world conditions.
title: Chinese Scientists Claim to Have Built Microwave Weapon That Converges Energy Beams on a Single Target

description: NASA’s Jet Propulsion Laboratory (JPL) is testing SWIM robots to potentially explore the subsurface oceans of Europa, one of Jupiter’s moons, believed to contain conditions suitable for life. The robots are designed to navigate autonomously and gather data through temperature, pH, and chemical sensors, helping scientists identify potential life indicators on icy moons.
title: NASA SWIM Robots Tested for Future Missions to Explore Oceans on Europa

description: Evidence of ancient hot water activity on Mars has been found in a 4.45-billion-year-old zircon grain from the NWA7034 meteorite. The findings, detailed in Science Advances, reveal that hydrothermal systems were active on Mars during the Pre-Noachian period. Researchers suggest these systems, essential for life on Earth, could have made Mars habitable in its early history. This discovery sheds light on the planet's potential to host life during its formative years.
title: Evidence of Hot Water on Mars Found in Ancient Meteorite From Early Days of Solar System

description: The growing presence of satellite space junk, as more satellites enter Earth's orbit, has raised concerns about environmental impacts. Pollution from burnt-up satellites contributes to changes in atmospheric chemistry, with metals like aluminium potentially harming the ozone layer. Scientists warn that satellite re-entries are contributing to a rise in pollutants, which could disrupt the ozone’s protective function and change the atmosphere’s composition, with consequences for life on Earth.
title: Space Debris Accumulation in the Stratosphere Threatens Major Environmental Risks

description: China is about to launch the High Energy Photon Source (HEPS), a state-of-the-art synchrotron capable of providing high-resolution x-ray imaging. Expected to begin operations in late December, HEPS will enable scientists to explore atomic-level structures in materials and proteins. This new facility, costing $657 million, will offer advanced capabilities to researchers around the world, opening up new possibilities in structural biology and material science.
title: China to Reportedly Activate Powerful X-Ray Light Source to Reveal Atomic Structure of Proteins

description: NASA and ESA’s Hubble Space Telescope captured an edge-on view of spiral galaxy UGC 10043, located around 150 million light-years away. Displaying its prominent dust lanes and unique bulge, this galaxy image highlights regions of active star formation. Captured in 2000 and 2023, the composite image uses various light wavelengths to detail the structure of UGC 10043 and reveal its possible past interaction with a dwarf galaxy.
title: Hubble Space Telescope Captures Rare Edge-On View of a Spiral Galaxy Located Millions of Light-Years Away

description: ISRO has formalised an Implementation Agreement (IA) with the Australian Space Agency (ASA) to enhance cooperation on crew and crew module recovery for India's Gaganyaan mission. Signed on November 20, 2024, the agreement enables both space agencies to collaborate on ensuring support during the contingency phase of the mission, specifically focusing on recovery operations if an ascent phase aborts near Australian waters.
title: ISRO And Australian Space Agency Sign Implementation Agreement for Gaganyaan Crew Recovery

description: Black Forest Labs released four new artificial intelligence (AI) tools for its base text-to-image Flux.1 AI model last week. These four AI tools are based on separate models designed to execute specific image editing tasks within the image generator. The company claims that these tools will offer granular control over the output images and let users preserve the key elements while experimenting with different styles.
title: Black Forest Labs Introduces AI-Powered Flux.1 Tools for Advanced Image Editing

description: iQOO Neo 10 series, including a base and a Pro variant, will launch in China on November 29. The lineup will include dedicated in-house Q2 chips. iQOO has revealed the designs of the upcoming handsets and confirmed its display and camera details.
title: iQOO Neo 10 Series Key Specifications Confirmed; Design Showcased

description: Apple’s proposal to invest $100 million in Indonesia hasn’t met “fairness” principles, a top government official said. The latest comments indicate more hurdles ahead for Apple as it seeks to lift a ban on selling its flagship iPhone 16 in Southeast Asia’s largest economy.
title: Indonesia Calls Apple’s $100-Million Investment Offer Unfair

description: EY has launched a service called eVe that essentially offers a warm-up pre-interview preparation for candidates applying for a job at the company. People can ask eVe about EY’s compensation benefits, pension plans, and other related follow-up questions.
title: Ernst & Young Introduces Metaverse, AI to Its Hiring Process With New eVe Platform

description: Xiaomi’s all-new Redmi A4 5G brings 5G (among other features) to the entry-level segment. Enabling this is Qualcomm’s latest Snapdragon 4s Gen 2 SoC, which is said to be efficient and promises to deliver a smooth software experience, given the budget restrictions in this segment. The phone has several upgrades over the previous Redmi A3 model, and so kind of raises the bar for entry-level smartphones in general.
title: Redmi A4 5G First Impressions: An Entry-Level Beast?

description: Samsung's Black Friday sale is bringing discounts on a range of smartphones in India. Samsung is offering discounts on Galaxy Z Fold 6, Galaxy Z Flip 6, Galaxy S25 series, Galaxy S24 series and more during the sale. The sale has been live since Saturday and is available through the Samsung India website and other online and offline platforms.
title: Samsung's Black Friday Sale Brings Big Discounts on Galaxy Z Fold 6, Galaxy S24 Series, More

description: The iQOO 13 was launched in China last month and is set to come to India on December 3. The phone is equipped with a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and comes with a triple rear camera setup. We tested the iQOO 13's rear cameras and here are a bunch of camera samples for your viewing.
title: iQOO 13 Cameras: A Closer Look with Samples

description: Blue Origin’s NS-28 mission, which launched on 22 November 2024, included six passengers, including Emily Calandrelli, who became the 100th woman to reach space. The ten-minute suborbital journey, reaching an altitude of 106 kilometres, also carried Marc and Sharon Hagle, Austin Litteral, J.D. Russell, and Hank Wolfond.
title: Blue Origin’s NS-28 Carries the 100th Woman in Space, Makes Safe Landing

description: Redmi Watch 5 and Redmi Buds 6 Pro will launch alongside the Redmi K80 series in China. Ahead of the launch, design and key features of the smart wearables have been unveiled. The Redmi Buds 6 Pro are expected to join the Redmi Buds 6, which were launched in China in September, and succeed the Redmi Buds 5 Pro.
title: Redmi Watch 5, Buds 6 Pro Launch Set for November 27 Alongside Redmi K80 Series

description: Lightricks, a software company focused on image and video editing, released an open-source artificial intelligence (AI) video model in preview last week. Dubbed LTX Video, the AI model can generate medium-resolution videos in real time. While real-time video generation capability exists in a few large language models (LLMs), this is the first one to be open-sourced.
title: Lightricks Introduces Open-Source LTX Video AI Model With Real-Time Video Generation Capability

description: Tecno Phantom V Fold 2 and Phantom V Flip 2 5G were unveiled globally in September 2024. The book-style foldable Tecno Phantom V Fold 2 is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 9000+ chipset, while the Phantom V Flip 2 comes with a MediaTek Dimensity 8200 SoC. The India launch timeline of the two foldable smartphones has now been tipped.
title: Tecno Phantom V Fold 2 5G, Phantom V Flip 2 5G India Launch Timeline Tipped

description: The Telecom Regulatory Authority of India (TRAI) is aiming the improve transparency when it comes to network coverage claimed by telecom operators. In its recent guidelines announced on Friday, the country’s telecom watchdog has directed service providers to display the geospatial network coverage map, its availability, and the signal strength. This is said to enable better transparency and uniformity when it comes to providing wireless access service and help make users more informed decisions.
title: TRAI Directs Indian Telcos to Display Geospatial Network Coverage Maps on Their Website

description: HMD Fusion was launched in India as the latest smartphone by Human Mobile Devices (HMD). The handset comes with interchangeable covers (sold separately) called 'Smart Outfits' that work with specialised smart pins. Users can attach these outfits to the back of their phones to give them a distinctive look and add functionality.
title: HMD Fusion With Smart Outfits, Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: The first detailed image of a star outside the Milky Way reveals WOH G64, a giant nearing its end. Captured by the Very Large Telescope Interferometer, this dying star, 1,500 times the size of the Sun, is surrounded by a cocoon of gas and dust, hinting at its eventual collapse into a supernova.
title: First Zoomed-in Picture of a Star Outside Our Galaxy Captured, Revealed to Be a Dying Star

description: Honor 300 series China launch date has been officially revealed. The Chinese smartphone vendor has announced the launch of its new lineup through its social media channel. The Honor 300, Honor 300 Pro, and Honor 300 Ultra will debut as the successor to the Honor 200 series that launched in India in July. The lineup is teased to run on MagicOS 9 out of the box and the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset.
title: Honor 300 Series Launch Set for December 2; Teased to Run on Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 Chipset

description: Trump’s media firm Truth Social has filed for a trademark for ‘TruthFi’, hinting at exploring the Web3 space. As per a report by New York Times, if TruthFi comes into operation, it is likely that Trump’s media organisation could consider acquiring smaller Web3 firms and onboard people familiar with the sector.
title: Trump Media Files for ‘TruthFi’ Trademark, Hinting at Expansion into Web3

description: Redmi K80 Pro is scheduled to launch in China on November 27 alongside the standard K80 model. Ahead of its imminent debut, the Chinese smartphone maker has confirmed key specifications of the upcoming handset, including its battery, camera, display, and processor, via its social media handles. The Redmi K80 Pro is said to be powered by Qualcomm’s latest Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and its optics unit will be headlined by a 50-megapixel telephoto camera with 2.5x optical zoom.
title: Redmi K80 Pro Camera, Processor and Other Key Features Confirmed Ahead of Launch

description: The Indian Institute of Science (IISc) has launched Pravriddhi, a national product accelerator, to enhance India’s manufacturing capabilities. By promoting collaboration among academic institutions, enterprises, and research labs, the programme aims to tackle challenges in the sector, reduce dependency on imports, and position India as a global manufacturing leader.
title: IISc Launches Pravriddhi Product Accelerator Programme to Develop Innovative Solutions

description: Sony is reportedly working on a handheld that will natively play PS5 games, contrary to the PlayStation Portal that only serves as a remote player for the console. The PlayStation parent is said to have begun early development on the portable device.
title: Sony in 'Early Stages' of Developing New PS5 Gaming Handheld to Compete With Nintendo Switch: Report

description: Clay cylinders bearing alphabetic inscriptions have been discovered in a 2400 BCE tomb at Tell Umm-el Marra, Syria. The find challenges prior beliefs about the origin and timeline of alphabetic writing, previously thought to have emerged around 1900 BCE in Egypt. The artefacts, unearthed by Johns Hopkins University researchers, include Early Bronze Age relics and provide new insights into the development of communication systems in early urban societies.
title: Researchers Find Evidence of the Oldest Alphabetic Writing in Human History in Syria

description: Two Neolithic stone circles were recently discovered on Dartmoor, England. Alan Endacott, archaeologist, suggests these sites, one named Metheral and the other Irishman’s Wall, were part of a 5-mile ceremonial arc from 5,000 years ago. The findings highlight the cultural and spiritual significance of Dartmoor's uplands in prehistoric times. Similarities with Stonehenge suggest potential connections between the builders of these iconic sites.
title: Neolithic Stone Circles Discovered in England Could Solve the Stonehenge Mystery: Report

description: Microsoft is rolling out its artificial intelligence (AI)-powered Recall feature with the latest  Windows 11 Insider Preview update, the company has announced. The feature first debuted at the Microsoft Surface and AI event in May but its initial version faced criticism due to privacy and security concerns. and hence, its rollout to Windows Insiders testers was halted. It works on Microsoft’s new lineup of Copilot+ PCs running Windows 11 and captures user activity via screenshots, enabling them to carry out searches at a later date.
title: Microsoft's AI-Powered Recall Finally Rolling Out to Copilot+ PCs With Windows 11 Insider Preview

description: The CCI internal order showed that Apple in November alleged that the main complainant in the antitrust investigation - Indian non-profit Together We Fight Society (TWFS) - had not complied with the directives to give an assurance that the old investigation reports had been destroyed.
title: CCI Rejects Apple Request to Put Antitrust Report on Hold

description: NASA-backed research published in Nature Communications has found that RNA molecules exhibit no chemical preference for left- or right-handed amino acids under simulated early-Earth conditions. This discovery, led by UCLA researchers, challenges the idea that RNA played a decisive role in determining the molecular handedness seen in modern life, known as homochirality.
title: NASA Research Challenges RNA's Role in Life’s Molecular Handedness Mystery

description: Tether currently uses Cantor’s custody business to hold the billions of dollars of US Treasuries that support the value of its dominant USDT stablecoin. That custody relationship earns Cantor tens of millions of dollars a year, according to people familiar with the matter.
title: Lutnick’s Cantor in Talks With Tether About $2 Billion Bitcoin Lending Project

description: The overall crypto market cap slipped by 0.77 percent in the last 24 hours. Bitcoin and Ether recorded minor gains on Monday, November 25. Tron, Ripple, and Dogecoin recorded losses on the price chart. Meanwhile, EOS and Iota showed profits.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin Maintains Price Over $98,000, Altcoins Remain Volatile

description: Apple's iPhone 17 lineup is at least an year away from launch, however, speculations about the camera capabilities of the iPhone 17 series are now doing rounds on the Web. A recent leak suggests that Apple will keep periscope cameras exclusive to the Pro models next year. LG Innotek, an electronic component manufacturer, is reportedly investing in new facilities, possibly to be ready for next year's iPhone 17 Pro cameras.
title: Apple's 5x Periscope Telephoto Camera Will Remain Exclusive to iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max: Report

description: Nothing Phone 3 may arrive soon as a successor to the Nothing Phone 2, which was launched in India in July. The phone was also teased in the Nothing Ear Open launch video in September. The purported Phone 3 series handsets have previously been spotted on the IMEI database, suggesting an imminent India launch. One of the anticipated smartphones has now appeared on a popular benchmarking website.
title: New Nothing Device, Said to Be Phone 3, Spotted on Geekbench With Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 SoC

description: OnePlus is rolling out the stable version of its latest operating system (OS) update dubbed OxygenOS 15 for the OnePlus Open in India, the company announced on Sunday. Based on Android 15, it introduces visual enhancements with Flux Themes and improved animations across the user interface (UI), adds artificial intelligence (AI) features for photo editing and productivity, and makes transferring files with iOS devices easier courtesy of the new OnePlus Share app.
title: OnePlus Open Gets OxygenOS 15 Update With Flux Themes and AI Features in India

description: Realme 14 series is expected to launch in India in January next year. While there's no word from Realme about the lineup, a new leak suggests the Realme 14 Pro 5G's possible colour options, RAM and storage details. The Realme 13 Pro successor is said to come in two finishes and three RAM and storage configurations in India.
title: Realme 14 Pro 5G Colour Options, RAM and Storage Configurations Tipped

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Z Fold 7 are expected to land in the second half of next year. The 2025 foldable lineup may likely be the first foldables to utilise the company's in-house Exynos SoC. To be more exact, the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Z Fold 7 are said to run on Exynos 2500. Meanwhile, the Galaxy S25 trio is rumoured to launch with a Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy across the board.
title: Samsung's Next Generation Galaxy Z Foldables Tipped to Come With Exynos 2500 Chip

description: Realme's GT Neo 7 series has been a part of several leaks and reports in recent weeks. The lineup is expected to include a base and an SE variant, succeeding the Realme GT Neo 6 and GT Neo 6 SE, respectively. A senior company official has now confirmed the launch timeline of the new series. Meanwhile, a tipster has suggested some key expected specifications of the base variant.
title: Realme GT Neo 7 Series Confirmed to Launch in December

description: Google has introduced a new feature for its Calendar app on Android which aims to make managing tasks easier. The app lets users create tasks, edit them with details, create sub-tasks, and use them with Google Workspace products like Gmail and Calendar — synced across devices. The company introduced full-screen task lists on the web last year and the same experience is now rolling out to Android smartphones. With its rollout, users will be able to get a complete view of all of their tasks and task lists.
title: Google Calendar Gets Full-Screen Task Lists Feature on Android for Easy Task Management

description: Microsoft announced Edge Game Assist, an in-game browser focussed on game-centric features, for PC players Friday. The browser, a custom version of the Edge browser is currently available in Preview and is meant to seamlessly provide game hints, guides and more.
title: Microsoft Announces Edge Game Assist, an In-Game Browser That Provides Game Hints, Guides and More

description: NASA supercomputers have provided a detailed look into the Sun’s complex inner workings by simulating its plasma flows. Using data from various space missions, including the Solar Dynamics Observatory, researchers have recreated turbulent motions and shock waves within the Sun’s layers. These insights will enhance space weather predictions, which are crucial for safeguarding astronauts and spacecraft, especially during high-profile missions like NASA's Artemis programme.
title: NASA Supercomputers Help Unravel Complex Movements of the Sun’s Inner Layers

description: OpenAI announced two ways it is improving its artificial intelligence (AI) models last week. The first includes releasing a new update for the GPT-4o (also known as the GPT-4 Turbo), the company’s latest AI model powering ChatGPT for paid subscribers. The company says the update improves the creative writing ability of the model and makes it better at natural language responses and writing engaging content with high readability.
title: OpenAI Updates GPT-4o With Improved Creative Writing Ability, Reveals New Automated Red Teaming Method

description: iOS 19 is rumoured to be in development as the next operating system (OS) update for iPhone. The successor to iOS 18 is expected to be previewed next year in the summer and debut in September, alongside the purported iPhone 17 series. However, a new report suggests iOS 19 will initially carry only some of the new features that are said to be in development and some of them may be postponed for release at a later date.
title: Apple's iOS 19 Update for iPhone to Reportedly See a Staggered Feature Rollout Like iOS 18

description: Apple was expected to launch AirPods Max 2 at its September event but that did not happen. Instead, it introduced a refreshed version of the original AirPods Max headphones with a USB Type-C port which replaced the proprietary Lightning port, in line with the company’s other devices. However, the Cupertino-based tech giant does not have plans to introduce a big revamp to its over-ear headphones due to relatively low sales of the device, according to a report.
title: AirPods Max Will Not See Any ‘Meaningful’ Upgrades Due to Low Sales, Says Mark Gurman

description: Moto G 5G (2025) could soon launch as a successor to the Moto G 5G (2024), which was unveiled in March this year alongside the Moto G Power 5G (2024). A new report has shared alleged design renders of the Moto G 5G (2025), which suggests some features of the handset. It has hinted at the expected dimension details of the purported smartphone.
title: Moto G 5G (2025) Leaked Design Surfaces Online; Suggests Triple Rear Camera Setup
